de.felix.astar.ui

Class PathfinderApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • de.felix.astar.ui.PathfinderApplication

  • public class PathfinderApplication
extends javafx.application.Application
    A JavaFX Application that visualizes the interaction with the Pathfinder class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  PathfinderApplication.NodeUpdateListener
      Implementation of the INodeUpdateListener that updates the visual representations of every node if one is updated.
      private static class  PathfinderApplication.Status
      The status enum represents the current status of the algorithm in the ui.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javafx.application.Application

        javafx.application.Application.Parameters

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean allowDiagonal
      Whether or not diagonal movement is allowed.
      private static javafx.scene.text.Font CONTROL_FONT
      The Font for each control-UI element.

      The margin of each control-UI element.
      private static javafx.scene.text.Font COSTS_FONT
      The font for the g- and h-costs.
      private static javafx.geometry.Insets COSTS_PADDING
      The padding of the texts containing the f-, g- and h-cost.
      private static int DEFAULT_UPDATE_DELAY
      The default delay that will be waited after the update of each node to simulate the pathfinder.
      private static javafx.scene.text.Font F_COST_FONT
      The font for the g-cost.
      private long nodeUpdateDelay
      The delay to wait before each Node Update in order to simulate the A* algorithm.
      private Pathfinder pathfinder
      The Pathfinder instance to use in order to execute the algorithm.

      The thread in which the Pathfinder.findPath()-Method will be executed.

      Stores the latest key that is currently pressed.

      The size of each rectangle representing a node.

      Stores the stage that is currently active.

      Stores the current PathfinderApplication.Status of the UI.

      The Font for each control-UI element.

      UI label representing the current PathfinderApplication.Status.

        The thread in which the Pathfinder.findPath()-Method will be executed.

      • pressingKey

        private javafx.scene.input.KeyCode pressingKey
        Stores the latest key that is currently pressed. This is used to check if the 'S' or 'E' key is pressed when click to set the start or end point.

      • nodeUpdateDelay

        private long nodeUpdateDelay
        The delay to wait before each Node Update in order to simulate the A* algorithm.

        Whether or not diagonal movement is allowed.

        Parameters:
        event - the MouseEvent instance.

      • initializeClickUI

        private void initializeClickUI()
        Creates a UI which allows the user to control the algorithm. The user can use buttons and sliders in order to start, stop and change the speed of the algorithm.

      • createNodeVisual

        private void createNodeVisual(Node node,
                              int x,
                              int y)
        Creates a visual representation of a node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to represent.
        x - the visual x-coordinate.
        y - the visual y-coordinate.
